name: Ladybug Infestation
description:
Keyboard Controls (gamepad also available):

Z - Lock Aim
X - Jump
C - Shoot
ArrowKeys - Move

Enter the world of 'Ladybug Infestation,' where you play as a clone ladybug on a mission to save the hatchlings and defeat the evil clone who has gone rogue. With five areas to explore and five upgrades to acquire, you'll be able to navigate treacherous terrain and battle fierce foes in your quest for freedom.

But beware - your choices will determine the outcome of the game, as there are two possible endings to uncover. Will you free all the hatchlings and earn the good ending, or will you just defeat the boss and face the consequences? The fate of the ladybug world is in your hands in 'Ladybug Infestation'

Crafted with passion and skill in just 30 days for the MetroidVania Month 19 Game Jam
